text:
I am trying to print a report by rendering PCL and a extra blank page is 
inserted at the end everytime.  This same application will render PDF and 
display only two pages. I thought this might be related to bug #7487 however 
the page break statement occurs in the middle of document but the blank page is 
added to the end.  Any help is appreciated.  Let me know if you require any 
additional information to find a solution.  Cheers !
creator: Christopher.Edmonstone@accenturebizservicesbc.com

text:
This might be the result of a change between 0.20.4 and 0.20.5 and outlined in the FAQ:

http://xml.apache.org/fop/faq.html#blank-page-between-page-sequences

and discussed in the archives here:

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=fop-user&m=106612058509435&w=2

I hope this helps! If not, questions like this are better suited on the mailing list than in our bug-
tracking system. This link describes how to get on the mailing list:

http://xml.apache.org/fop/maillist.html

Good luck!

Web Maestro Clay
creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com

text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
